title: Now, and the Hour of Death
description: Five short tales of the eerie, tragic, and macabre.Three friends venture into an abandoned church, unaware the foundation is haunted.An expert in the occult is asked to remove a presence from the beach.Two survivors of the zombie apocalypse watch a final sunset together.Two lovers will do anything to keep their home and love safe.A serial killer is on the loose, but his step is watched by more than his victims.
author: Karen Lykkebo
